name: Zombi Pilot
overview: Piloting a landing module, you must disengage from the support spaceship and attempt a soft landing on the planet Zombi. The module is equipped with small thrusters that you will need to use to mitigate the descent and to land safely on the ramp that will appear on the screen. Instrumentation on-board will report all the parameter which you will need to take into account. Published in Italy as Pilota Astrale in Go Games n.10 (Giugno 1986) and in Super Game 2000 N°10 (Dicembre 1985) as Recupera i Cristalli.
